Package main

Class ClackServer

java.lang.Object
main.ClackServer
public class ClackServer extends Object
The ClackServer class is a blueprint for a ClackServer object that contains information about the port number that clients connect to, a boolean representing whether the server needs to be closed or not, and ClackData objects representing data sent to and received from the client.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClackServer()
    This ClackServer Default constructor initializes port to the DEFAULT_PORT value and initializes dataToReceiveFromClient and dataToSendToClient to null values.
    ClackServer​(int port)
    This ClackServer constructor initializes port to a user-provided value and initializes dataToReceiveFromClient and dataToSendToClient to null values.

      public ClackServer​(int port) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This ClackServer constructor initializes port to a user-provided value and initializes dataToReceiveFromClient and dataToSendToClient to null values.
      Parameters:
      port - new port value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • ClackServer

      public ClackServer()
      This ClackServer Default constructor initializes port to the DEFAULT_PORT value and initializes dataToReceiveFromClient and dataToSendToClient to null values.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method initializes the ServerSocket and starts the communication with the ClackClient class.

    • receiveData

      public void receiveData()
      This method is used to receive ClackData objects from the ClackClient class using the inFromClient ObjectInputStream object. It then sets the value of dataToReceiveFromClient to the read in object.

    • sendData

      public void sendData()
      This method is used to send data to the ClackClient class by using the outToClient ObjectOutputStream object.

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      This is the accessor for the port
      Returns:
      value of port

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This method overrides the toString() method from the ClackData class and the Object class
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the port, connection, data to receive from client and the data to send to client, separated by commas
